text: Lt. John B. Bibb (October 27, 1789, in Prince Edward County, Virginia - April 12, 1840Kentucky Historical Society) served in the War of 1812, represented Logan County in the Kentucky House of Representatives and the state Senate from 1827 to 1834. Lt. Bibb was also an amateur horticulturist and developed the modern Bibb lettuce at his mansion in Frankfort, Kentucky. However, it wasn't offered commercially until 1935. ==References== Category:1789 births Category:1840 deaths Category:People with foods named after them Category:Military people from Virginia Category:Politicians from Kentucky Category:Politicians from Virginia
title: John B. Bibb
